title: Losing my LP because of bad internet.
body:
My internet disconnected 3 times over the past month during champ select and I lost a lot of lp because of it. It's not my fault that I disconnected, if I argued with my parents to make the wifi more stable, they would just yell at me for "only knowing how to game". Rito pls ;-; This is super frustrating. Is there a way to tell riot that it's not actually my fault for dodging the queue?

It really sucks to be like it.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there's no way for the server to determine what exactly happened. The server simply sees a disconnection from the platform, the same as if you intentioned pulled the power plug from your PC or if you ragequit and closed the client out entirely.

If feasible, you may want to migrate to a physical (Ethernet) connection to your router, as wireless connections are convenient, but they rarely offer a completely stable connection for games like League, that require a *really stable* connection.

Let me know if you have any questions.
